channel.title: Website on Ana Rebelo
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Ana Rebelo

item.title: MINEX III Certification by NIST
item.description: In collaboration with the Imprensa Nacional-Casa da Moeda (INCM), our work obtained MINEX III certification - Minutiae Interoperability Exchange - by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) of the United States (US) Department of Commerce. This certification is a test used to establish that template generation and correspondence algorithms comply with the US government’s Personal Identity Verification (PIV) program and aims to assess the quality and robustness of biometric recognition algorithms.

item.title: Best reviewer award at IJCB2020
item.description: The 2020 International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB 2020) combines two major biometrics research conferences, the Biometrics Theory, Applications and Systems (BTAS) conference and the International Conference on Biometrics (ICB).

item.title: Monitor in the Future of Computing Summer School.
item.description: Monitor in the GPU-Accelerated Computing workshop given by Cristiana Dinea from NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute. Check more at Future of Computing summer school website.
